div.p: Year 31, Athyr 12 in Philadelphia of the Arsinoite nome. A notification to Alexandros, chief policeman, from Antigenes, a Macedonian, of the troop of Nikanor, cleruch. I have lost a white female ass, which escaped from Nikias by night, of which the value is 80 drachmas. Translation: P.Mich. 1 34
